titles: The asse beaten for bawling; or, A replie from the city to the crie of the country.
author: Cooper, Edmund.
publisher: Printed by J[ohn]. Brudenell, dwelling in Maiden-head-ally near New-Gate,
notes: Verse: "To you, because you are one manifold,".
Signed: Edm. Cooper of Limestreet, Doctor of Physick.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Political satire, English --  Early works to 1800.
